reg_pit.title: Rule 71-801 Implementing The Multijurisdictional Disclosure System Under National Instrument 71-101

change.changenote: Section 1.1 (c.1) and (g) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 106/2016, effective May 9, 2016.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: MI 62-104 means Multilateral Instrument 62-104 Take-Over Bids and Issuer Bids,
a term that is defined or interpreted in MI 62-104 has the meaning ascribed to it in that Instrument.

change.changenote: Section 3.1 (1), (a), (b) and (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 106/2016, effective May 9, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Subject to subsection (2), the following provisions of MI 62-104 do not apply to a bid made in compliance with Part 12 of NI 71-101:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: section 2.4, 2.5 and subsection 2.26 (4), unless 20% or more of each class of securities that is subject to the bid is held by persons whose last address as shown on the books of the issuer is in Canada, as determined in accordance with subsections 12.1 (2), (3) and (4) of NI 71-101,

change.changenote: Section 3.2 (1) and (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 106/2016, effective May 9, 2016.
